DaparToolshed 0.99.0

Method to aggregate peptides into proteins with the iterative approach.

Source: R/aggregation_func.R
aggIterative.Rd

Method to aggregate peptides into proteins with the iterative approach

aggIterative(
  x,
  MAT,
  conditions = NULL,
  init.method = "Sum",
  iter.method = "Mean",
  n = NULL
)

Arguments

conditions

xxx

init.method

The method used to initialize the iterative algotirhm. Default is 'Sum'.

n

xxxx

qPepData

A matrix of intensities of peptides.

X

An adjacency matrix

method

The method used for xxx. Default value is 'Mean'.

Value

A matrix of protein intensities.

Author

Samuel Wieczorek

Examples

library(QFeatures)

Exp1_R25_pept <- readRDS(system.file("data", 'Exp1_R25_pept.rda', package="DaparToolshedData"))
#> Warning: cannot open compressed file '', probable reason 'Invalid argument'
#> Error in gzfile(file, "rb"): cannot open the connection

#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'Exp1_R25_pept' not found
obj <- addListAdjacencyMatrices(obj, 2)
#> Error in addListAdjacencyMatrices(obj, 2): could not find function "addListAdjacencyMatrices"

#> Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'as.matrix': could not find function "GetAdjMat"

#> Error in h(simpleError(msg, call)): error in evaluating the argument 'x' in selecting a method for function 'colData': object 'obj' not found
